alert.note: Alert for Pawnee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 14 at 12:18AM CDT until August 14 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL OSAGE AND CENTRAL PAWNEE COUNTIES... At 1217 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Burbank to 8 miles north of Blackburn to 3 miles northeast of Hallett, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Pawhuska... Pawnee... Hominy... Cleveland... Fairfax... Shidler... Wynona... Ralston... Osage... Burbank... Hallett... Blackburn... Maramec... Skedee... Pearsonia... Sunset Lake... Apperson... Pershing... Nelagoney... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
